description: WaitingCause indicates why a task run is waiting to execute.

^(connectionLimit)$.description: Task is waiting due to database connection limit.

^(parallelTasksLimit)$.description: Task is waiting due to parallel execution limit.

^(taskUid)$.description: Task is waiting for another task to complete.

connection_limit.description: Task is waiting due to database connection limit.

parallel_tasks_limit.description: Task is waiting due to parallel execution limit.

task_uid.description: Task is waiting for another task to complete.

title: Waiting Cause
